citation.title: Weather and extreme heat in association to mental disorders : The case of Hanoi, Vietnam

news.title: Heat exposure associated with mental illness, Vietnamese study shows - Healthcanal.com
news.summary: A mental hospital-based study in Hanoi, Vietnam looked at if there is a relationship between heat exposure and mental health problems.

news.title: Heat exposure associated with mental illness, study shows
news.summary: A mental hospital-based study in Hanoi, Vietnam looked at if there is a relationship between heat exposure and mental health problems.

news.title: Vietnamese researcher says that heat exposure is associated with mental illness
news.summary: The causes of what is referred to as mental illness are often not at all very clear.

news.title: Studie visar samband mellan extrem hetta och mental ohälsa
news.summary: I en studie av patientstatistik från ett mentalsjukhus i Vietnams huvudstad Hanoi har förekomsten av samband mellan exponering för extrem hetta och mental ohälsa undersökts.
